interfaces

Interface ContestantBenchInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContestantBench

    public interface ContestantBenchInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Operational interface of a remote object of type ContestantBench. It provides the functionality to access the ContestantBench.
